code: new_portfolio_site(   dir = ".",   force = NA,   install_hugo = TRUE,   sample = FALSE,   format = "yaml",   theme = c("raditian", "kross", "portio"),   theme_example = TRUE,   netlify = TRUE,   ... )

title: Creates a New Data Science Portfolio Website — new_portfolio_site
text: dir directory new site. force Whether create site directory even empty. default, force = TRUE directory contains hidden, RStudio project (*.Rproj), LICENSE, /README files. install_hugo Whether install Hugo automatically found. sample Whether add sample content. Hugo creates empty site default, function adds sample content default. format format configuration file, e.g., 'yaml' 'toml' (value TRUE treated 'yaml', FALSE means 'toml'). Note frontmatter new (R) Markdown file created new_content() always uses YAML instead TOML JSON. theme theme can defined several ways. Preset themes raditian (default): Custom version free hugo raditian theme kross: Custom version free hugo kross theme portio: Custom version free hugo portio theme Hugo theme Github character string form user/repo GIT branch tag name @, .e. theme can form user/repo@branch). full URL zip file tarball theme. Theme theme = NA, themes installed, manually install theme. theme_example Whether copy example exampleSite directory exists theme. themes provide example sites. netlify Whether create Netlify config file netlify.toml. ... Additional arguments can passed blogdown::new_site().
